title: How the Trumps turned an election victory into a cash bonanza
summary: The Trumps have secured more than $80 million through settlements, business deals, and media ventures. Melania landed a $40 million Amazon deal for a documentary, while Trump settled lawsuits with Meta, X, and ABC, funneling millions into his presidential library. The family also expanded its crypto and stock ventures, with Trump Jr. joining corporate boards that saw their stocks soar
